episodes.name: ONE PIECE - Inside the Story
episodes.overview: Go behind the scenes of Netflix's live action One Piece.

episodes.name: Bloopers
episodes.overview: ONE PIECE bloopers with all your favorite Straw Hats are here

episodes.name: Behind the Stunts
episodes.overview: Take a look behind the scenes at how the cast trained for One Piece's epic stunt sequences.

episodes.name: Building the World
episodes.overview: The cast and creators of ONE PIECE discuss how they brought the manga to life.

episodes.name: Set Sneak Peek: First Look Netflix Geeked Week
episodes.overview: Get a first look at the sets of One Piece. Actor Iñaki Godoy and showrunners Steven Maeda and Matt Owens introduce a behind the scenes glimpse into bringing the world of One Piece to life.

episodes.name: Inside the Sets
episodes.overview: Take an inside look at the massive sets built for Netflix's live action One Piece adaptation.

episodes.name: Cobra Kai's Jacob Bertrand Visits the Set of ONE PIECE
episodes.overview: When the worlds of ‘Cobra Kai’ and ‘One Piece’ collide, you know you’re in for a good time. Such was the case when superfan Jacob Bertrand, known for his role as Hawk in ‘Cobra Kai,’ surprised the cast of ‘One Piece’ in South Africa.

episodes.name: Iñaki Godoy Meets the One Piece Creators
episodes.overview: One Piece star Iñaki Godoy (Monkey D. Luffy) tours the offices of Shueisha Games, publishers of Oda Sensei's manga and creators of the original anime series. Iñaki views storyboards for the One Piece anime pilot and shares how much the manga means to him.

episodes.name: Eiichiro Oda Meets Iñaki Godoy
episodes.overview: "I can’t imagine anyone else but you" ???? Come along with us on a dream visit to the studio of the legendary Eiichiro Oda.

episodes.name: A very special message from Eiichiro Oda
episodes.overview: NAKAMA!!! ????‍☠️???? It fills us with great joy to give you this message directly from Oda-Sensei

episodes.name: ROMANCE DAWN
episodes.overview: Stranded on a sinking boat, carefree Luffy begins his journey in search of a pirate king's lost treasure. But first, he'll need a crew, a ship and a map.

episodes.name: THE MAN IN THE STRAW HAT
episodes.overview: After securing a map to the Grand Line, Luffy, Nami and Zoro are taken hostage by a no-nonsense clown. New cadet Koby is cornered by Vice-Admiral Garp.

episodes.name: TELL NO TALES
episodes.overview: In need of a proper ship, the gang reaches Syrup Village and meets the cheerful Usopp and his best friend Kaya. A sinister threat disrupts their plans.

episodes.name: THE PIRATES ARE COMING
episodes.overview: With his friends in danger and Klahadore's plan in motion, Usopp seeks help from the Marines. Blades clash when a fierce battle erupts at Kaya's mansion.

episodes.name: EAT AT BARATIE!
episodes.overview: The Straw Hat Pirates face their first adversary as a group. At a floating fish house, Luffy befriends a cook, and Zoro enters a duel with a warlord.

episodes.name: THE CHEF AND THE CHORE BOY
episodes.overview: Sanji and head chef Zeff put their differences aside to save a severely wounded Zoro. A ruthless Fishman on a mission stirs up trouble for the crew.

episodes.name: THE GIRL WITH THE SAWFISH TATTOO
episodes.overview: After striking a deal with a familiar foe to find Arlong, Luffy and his friends set sail for Coco Village and learn about Nami's mysterious past.

episodes.name: WORST IN THE EAST
episodes.overview: The Straw Hat crew strives to take down Arlong and the Fishmen once and for all. After a tense family reunion, Luffy inches closer to his dreams.
